name: TheAudioChef
0:
”Alexa, open Audio Chef”
”Alexa, ask Audio Chef to load the recipe pancakes”
”Alexa, ask Audio Chef for the next step”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: audio chef
des: The Audio Chef give you step by step guidance through sample recipes an interactive audio format. Using audio prompts, Audio Chef can guide you through the recipe, freeing your hands to do the cooking.
